text: Atahpara ai byaktira ca'ite adhika jalema ke, ye allahara prati mithya aropa kare athaba tara nirdesabalike mithya bale? Tara tadera granthe likhita ansa peye yabe. Emana ki, yakhana tadera kache amara prerita pherasatara prana ne'oyara jan'ye pauche, takhana tara bale; tara kothaya gela, yadera ke tomara allaha byatita ahabana karate? Tara uttara debeh amadera kacha theke udha'o haye geche, tara nijedera samparke sbikara karabe ye, tara abasya'i kaphera chila.
